name: MetalTyrannomon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 level 6 Digimon card with [Machine] in its traits among them to your hand. Trash the remaining cards.
digivolve_effect: [Opponent's Turn] While this Digimon has [Machine] in its traits, it gains ＜Reboot＞. (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)
